version_description:
Fixed bug on Apple Watch and minor improvements

In case you missed out...
It’s now much faster to load the lyrics and translation and it comes with lots of bug fixes.

“Love comes at the speed of light”
- Continental Drift by The Rolling Stones

- If you spot a mistake in the lyrics you will now find an improved reporting tool to help us provide you better lyrics
- Improved romanized languages handling
- Bug fixes and improvements

“I need direction to perfection, no no no no, help me out
Yeah, you know you got to help me out”
The Killers - All These Things That I’ve Done

Musixmatch contributors, listen up! We have a new release for you.

Ever wanted to be updated about your contributions? We’ve got you covered!
Head over to your profile and check our new notification system.
Every time there are changes on lyrics you've added, synchronized or translated, you’ll get updates from the community.

We’ve also introduced new enhancements to the lyrics editor. Now you can save your lyrics as a draft to post later and you can also have our guidelines always handy while transcribing.

“Let’s take it nice and easy
It’s gonna be so easy”
- Nice ‘N’ Easy by Frank Sinatra

Love Musixmatch? Rate us 5 stars and share your love with the community!

Take your summer to the next level with the latest version of Musixmatch!

Enjoy the all new Spotify Connect!
Now it works also with Spotify free and let you match your Spotify free music with lyrics in Musixmatch.

All you have to do is:

* Connect your Spotify account within Musixmatch
* Play any artist, album, or playlist in shuffle mode (if you are a Spotify free user) or fire up any song you want ( if you have a Spotify Premium account) in Spotify
* Switch back to Musixmatch and get the lyrics party started!
Immediately get the lyrics to what's playing, in time with music and with their multi-language translations!

The fun is not over!
*Just swipe right on the Lockscreen and check out Musixmatch’s Today widget, the lyrics will be automatically there in sync with the song

“Ooh, baby
I feel like music sounds better with you”
- Music Sounds Better with You by Stardust

Bug fixes and faster widget loading
In case you missed out...

“Ooh, baby
I feel like music sounds better with you”
- Music Sounds Better with You by Stardust

- iOS 11 support
- More control over your Apple Music: For you, Charts and new playlists to browse are now available inside the app

“Love is old, love is new, love is all, love is you”
- Because by The Beatles

- iOS 11 support
- More control over your Apple Music: For you, Charts and new playlists to browse are now available inside the app

“Love is old, love is new, love is all, love is you”

“Love is old, love is new, love is all, love is you”
- Because by The Beatles

Enjoy your new iPhone X with Musixmatch, now optimized for Apple’s latest device.

“Ooh, are you ready for it?
Baby, let the games begin”
…Ready for it?, Taylor Swift

- Improved stability of the app and widget
- A great news for our community, lyrics reported by other users are now visible in the app.

"No mistake, no mistake
Make no mistake, make no mistake about it"
- Make No Mistake by Keith Richards

Meet Your New Musixmatch App

Today, we’re excited to announce the release of the brand-new Musixmatch 7.0, which offers a new look and feel, enhanced functionality, a more seamless lyrics discovery experience, and some dramatic improvements to make contributing to our catalogue with lyrics and translations a lot more fun.

Here are some of the features we are excited about:
New Home for your recommended content: discover your favourite lyrics, mixed with
with fresh recommendations, curated ready-to-stream playlists and lyrics you forgot you loved.

New colorful and immersive lyrics experience:
Have more control over your entire lyrics experience with the redesigned lyrics view.
Choose the background color you love and be ready to never miss a word again with the completely revamped lyrics visualization, perfect to follow your favorite song word by word.

Seamless connection with your music: link your Apple Music or Spotify (free or premium) account so you can import your playlists and stream millions of songs with lyrics seamlessly.

Centered space for our Community: users are the power of Musixmatch and now the truly heart of the new app with their brand new Contribute tab that gives a faster access to all the ways to get involved in our Community, in addition to brand new leaderboards and stats.

We’re excited to have you try it out, and thanks for all your continued feedback and support.

“Let the games begin
Are you ready for it?”

“...Ready for it?” - Taylor Swift

Thank you for the incredibly positive response to the new Musixmatch app!
We are so happy you love it as much as we do!
You gave us additional amazing ideas to improve the app even further and we heard you.

This new version of the app comes with:
- a new dark theme, for your late-night listening sessions.
- a fix for the logout problem on the Spotify connection ( nothing will stop your music again!)
- a lot of major speed improvements that we hope you'll like.

Have fun and let us know what you think!

“Baby, You look perfect tonight”
- Perfect by Ed Sheeran

Thank you for the incredibly positive response to the new Musixmatch app!
We are so happy you love it as much as we do!
You gave us additional amazing ideas to improve the app even further and we heard you.

This new version of the app comes with:
- a new dark theme, for your late-night listening sessions.
- a fix for the logout problem on the Spotify connection ( nothing will stop your music again!)
- a lot of major speed improvements that we hope you'll like.

Have fun and let us know what you think!

“Baby, You look perfect tonight”
- Perfect by Ed Sheeran

Bug fixes and speed improvements
Improved play and stability on Bluetooth devices

"You only miss the sun when it starts to snow, only know you love her when you let her go"
- Let Her Go by Passenger

- Bug fixes and improvements
- Fixed bug affecting widget usage with Spotify

From this version you can choose either to connect your Local / Apple Music library or connect Spotify, please make sure you’re connected to the source of music you’re actually using.

“Sometimes the greatest way to say something
Is to say nothing at all”
- Say something by Justin Timberlake feat. Chris Stapleton

- Bug fixes on the Today widget
- Speed improvements for music playback
- New saved lyrics section for Premium users

“Your love was made for somebody like me”
- Shape of You by Ed Sheeran

- Bug fixes on the Today widget
- Speed improvements for music playback
- New saved lyrics section for Premium users

“Your love was made for somebody like me”
- Shape of You by Ed Sheeran

- Bugfix for users using Apple Music on iOS 11.3
- New and updated Watch app, now it is much faster and requires WatchOS 4.0
- We found and fixed several minor mistakes which made the app more stable

“Everybody hoping they could be the one
I was born to run, I was born for this”
- Whatever it takes by Imagine Dragons

- We heard your voice, you can now choose to sync lyrics line by line or word by word!
- Your privacy is important to us, we’ve updated our privacy policy to give you more control over your data

“I’ve got no roots, but my home was never on the ground” - No Roots by Alice Merton

We’re excited to introduce Party mode: a new fun way to sing along to any song.
Play any song from your music library and with a single tap you can start a beautiful sing-along experience with lyrics synced word by word.
Party mode is included in the new Musixmatch Premium plan only.

Warm up your vocal chords and get the Party started!

“Party rock is in the house tonight
Everybody just have a good time (yeah)“
- Party Rock Anthem by LMFAO

We keep improving the app smashing bugs and making it faster for you.

Bug fixes and improvements:
- Fixed issue causing problems with Apple Music browsing

We’re always making changes and improvements to Musixmatch. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

“When I met you in the summer
to my heartbeat’s sound
We fell in love as the leaves turned brown” - Summer by Calvin Harris

Hello iOS12!
Siri just got a lot smarter, here we are with shortcuts to help you find lyrics even faster. Hey Siri… Identify lyrics - and you’ll get the lyrics to what’s playing on the radio. Yes, it’s that easy!

“If there's something you'd like to try
Ask me, I won't say no, how could I?”
- Ask by The Smiths

"I learned the lyrics and knew you were mine"
- Music to My Eyes by Lady Gaga feat. Bradley Cooper

- Now you can complete your profile to match your music taste

We keep improving the app smashing bugs and making it faster for you.



“I think that you'll be happier
I want you to be happier”
- Happier by Marshmello feat. Bastille

- Fixed bug with Apple Music connection

“Lately, I've been, I've been thinking
I want you to be happier”
- Happier by Marshmello feat Bastille

Come out and play”
- Come Out and Play by Billie Eilish

Come out and play”
- Come Out and Play by Billie Eilish

- Fixed bug affecting widget users
- General bug fixes and performance improvements

"Rockin' around the Christmas tree
Have a happy holiday
Everyone dancing merrily
In the new old fashioned way" by Brenda Lee

- General bug fixes and performance improvements

"Open your eyes
Look up to the skies and see" - Bohemian Rapsody by Queen

- General bug fixes and performance improvements

"Open your eyes
Look up to the skies and see" - Bohemian Rapsody by Queen

Thanks to everyone contributing on Musixmatch!

- Player redesigned to make our community even more visible, now the contributors on the lyrics are on the front-row
- The Contribute section has been improved to show you songs based on your favorite artists
- Lots of bug fixes on the Apple Music integration, the playback queue will work much better now, enjoy it hassle-free

"Power to the people, power to the people, right on"
Power to the people by John Lennon

We listened to your feedback and now you can find the list of all the amazing contributors who added, synced or translated any lyrics. Power to the community!
We never forget to bring you bug fixes and improvements, make sure to update to the latest version of the app.

"Maybe my contribution could be as small as hopin'
That words could turn to birds" Coachella - Woodstock In My Mind by Lana del Rey

We’re always working hard to make Musixmatch faster and better for you.

Redesigned the profile section, jump on board and show the world how important you are to us!
Bug fixes and improvements

“I like it when you take control
Even if you know that you don't own me”
-Bad guy - Billie Eilish

- Added Amazon Music support in United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Japan, France, Italy, Spain
- New home screen making your music from Apple or Spotify front and center
- Bugfixes to make the Spotify connection more reliable

"I'm on my way
Home sweet home
You know that I've seen"
Home Sweet home - Mötley Crüe

- General bug fixes and performance improvements

Look up to the skies and see" - Bohemian Rapsody by Queen

We too have joined the dark side!
We’re ready for iOS13 with a beautiful dark interface, it will be easier on the eyes, whether you’re reading your favorite lyrics at night-time or singing along at a party.
“On the dark side of the moon
I'll be waiting, I'll be waiting for you”
- Dark side of the moon by Pink Floyd

“On the dark side of the moon
I'll be waiting, I'll be waiting for you”
- Dark side of the moon by Pink Floyd

- Welcome our revamped lyrics visualization, our lyrics are now easier to read and to follow along.
- Bug fixes for users experiencing playback problems with local music files.
- Under the hood improvements to make the app faster and more reliable.

"I learned the lyrics and knew you were mine"
- Music to My Eyes by Lady Gaga feat. Bradley Cooper

- General bug fixes and performance improvements

We're always working to make your experience faster and more delightful.
- Customize the font size on the lyrics view
- Improved integration with Apple Music on iOS 13.4

"What doesn't kill you makes you stronger
Stand a little taller
Doesn't mean I'm lonely when I'm alone" -
What Doesn't Kill You (Stronger) - Kelly Clarkson

Starting today, your player will have a brand new look!
Now you can enjoy all the lyrics you love on a wide-screen surface, with renewed backgrounds and colors, making the lyrics experience the freshest you’ve ever seen.
You can also sing along with word by word lyrics so you don’t have to embarrass yourself at every karaoke party anymore. You got this now!

But we’re not done yet!
We are also excited to launch the Musixmatch Academy, a brand new way to learn how to contribute on Musixmatch.
How does it work? Tap on the Academy card inside the homepage, watch the video lessons, take the test, and graduate.
Your graduation certificate is waiting for you!

“Now who’s the king of these rude, ludicrous, lucrative lyrics?”
Renegade - Jay-Z, Eminem

“Now who’s the king of these rude, ludicrous, lucrative lyrics?”
Renegade - Jay-Z, Eminem

- Apple Signin now available
- General bug fixes and performance improvements

"When I met you in the summer
To my heartbeat's sound"
Summer - Calvin Harris

Hey everyone!
With this update, we want to reward and give back to our amazing and loyal community.
From now, you will have the chance to get Premium for free and experience all the features while enjoying your favorite music.
How? By helping the community and contributing to Musixmatch catalog of lyrics and music data.
Tap on the card inside the Contribute section to discover more.

"Lighting a ray of hope for me
And now I am free"
I am free - Mariah Carey

General bug fixes and performance improvements

"Lighting a ray of hope for meAnd now I am free"I am free - Mariah Carey

Welcome our new widget for iOS 14.
Add it to your Home Screen and be inspired by quotes from your recently played songs.

Welcome our new widget for iOS 14.
Add it to your Home Screen and be inspired by quotes from your recently played songs.

General bug fixes and performance improvements

"Lighting a ray of hope for me
And now I am free"

"Lighting a ray of hope for me
And now I am free"
I am free - Mariah Carey

General bug fixes and performance improvements

"Lighting a ray of hope for me
And now I am free"
I am free - Mariah Carey

Our music player experience just got richer.
Discover our brand new song shortcuts, your favorite chorus is just a tap away.
From now on, you will be able to skip right to the chorus or play your favorite sections of the
songs you love, without getting lost. How cool is that?
You can also contribute to tag song shortcuts using our redesigned contribution tool.

"I'm here to stay and make the difference that I can make
Our differences, they do a lot to teach us how to use
The tools and gifts we got yeah, we got a lot at stake"
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz

We have added a new tool to refine lyrics transcription. It's now easier to add or edit lyrics.
We have also made many general improvements and fixed some bugs

"I'm here to stay and make the difference that I can make
Our differences, they do a lot to teach us how to use
The tools and gifts we got yeah, we got a lot at stake"
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz

This release brings the mission to the app, specially for Curators!
We've also fixed some bugs and improved general performance
Thanks for using Musixmatch!

"Don't stop me now
I'm having such a good time
I'm having a ball"
Don't Stop Me Now - Queen

Hey Music Lovers!
Take a look at our brand new contribute menu.
Now it's more easy and clear how to contribute and become part of the world largest lyrics catalog community!

"I contribute
I belong when I contribute"
Summer-Blink - Cocteau Twins
